content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.

So, to recap, your updated morning routine is:

**Monday to Friday**

* 6:30 AM - Wake up
* 6:40 AM - Meditation session (10-15 minutes)
* 6:55 AM - Prepare lunch (20 minutes)
* 7:15 AM - Get ready for the gym
* 7:30 AM - Gym session

Remember to set those reminders to help you stay on track!

If you need any further adjustments or have any other questions, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope this routine helps you start your weekdays on a positive note!
